meanings.definition: Capable of eradicating or destroying completely.
meanings.sent1: The powerful eradicant spray eliminated all the weeds in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The eradicant treatment effectively removed all traces of the virus.
meanings.sent3: The eradicant cleaner was so strong that it wiped out even the toughest stains.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like an eradicant force, wiping away all obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The eradicant solution was like a magic potion, making all the pests disappear instantly.
